question: Which state government announced a slew of incentives for journalists?
explanation: Haryana Chief Minister Manohar Lal Khattar announced a slew of incentives for journalists, including a Rs 10,000 monthly pension scheme, for those who are above 60 years and have completed 20 years in the profession. The announcements were made by the Chief Minister at the "Swarna Jayanti Journalists' Meet". He also announced a life insurance cover of Rs 10 lakh and a cashless mediclaim policy of Rs 500,000.
